title: 1481Here’s what actually happened at Illinois daycare — Democrat is lying.posted5 days agobykinbergf

1481 Here’s what actually happened at Illinois daycare — Democrat is lying. posted 5 days ago by kinbergfan 142 comments award share report block Homeland Security @DHSgov • 7d Congressman, you are deliberately misrepresenting the facts. ICE law enforcement did NOT target a daycare and were only at this location because the female illegal alien fled inside. Here is the real story: Officers attempted to conduct a targeted traffic stop of this female Mike Quigley @RepMikeQuigley • 7d ICE isn’t going after the worst of the worst. This morning, they took a preschool teacher without a warrant IN FRONT OF CHILDREN in my district. #ice #chicago
